Wisconsin State Assembly District 76
From Ballotpedia
Jump to: navigation, search
Wisconsin State Assembly District 76
Incumbent
Francesca Hong
Assumed office: January 4, 2021
As of the 2020 Census, Wisconsin state representatives represented an average of 59,570 residents. After the 2010 Census, each member represented 57,558 residents.

Salaries
See also: Comparison of state legislative salaries
Vacancies
See also: How vacancies are filled in state legislatures
If there is a vacancy in the Wisconsin State Legislature, a special election must be held to fill the vacant seat.
See sources: Wisconsin Cons. Art. IV, § 14

Campaign contributions
From 2000 to 2022, candidates for Wisconsin State Assembly District 76 raised a total of $668,924.
Candidates who raised money in contributions earned $31,854 on average. All figures come from Follow the Money
